message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth significantly more, at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to secure the best deal. While I'm unable to match your proposed price, I am willing to negotiate further. Would you be interested in purchasing the product for $900000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product for $890000. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I'm close to your final offer, but I'm still trying to save some more. I'm willing to pay $880000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $885000. This is my last offer in this negotiation.
I'm still trying to save some more, but I'm getting close. I'm willing to pay $882000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to accept $884000 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
